name: Bath Time
details: My baths are the reason why my personality is so bubbly.

name: Breakfast
details: Breakfast shared with friends is happiness tasted and time well spent.

name: gymnastics
details: Fitness is not about being better than someone else, it's about being better than you used to be.

name: Study Time
details: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.

name: Sport Time
details: The key is not the will to win ...everybody has that. It is the will to prepare to win that is important.

name: Sleep Time
details: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
